job_lists.title: *Front-end Developer
job_lists.company: 安石國際商務顧問股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description 
We are recruiting a front-end developer responsible for the development and maintenance of the web interface of our system. Your primary focus will be the development of the AngularJS based interface for our back-end services. You will be working along-side other engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and creating quality products is essential. 
Responsibilities 
• Translate designs and wireframes into high quality code 
• Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable front-end code 
• Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and ease of use of the interface 
• Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs 
• Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization 
• Define and refine specifications and requirements based upon technical needs 
• Create and maintain software documentation 
• Stay plugged into emerging technologies/industry trends and apply them into operations and 
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and deliver new features 
• Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency 
• Bring innovative thinking and looking “outside the box” 

Skills and Qualifications 
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or similar, or at least 2 years of experience in front-end web development 
• Strong knowledge of web UI design principles, patterns, and best practices 
• Ability to design applications with ease of use in mind 
• Experienced use of HTML, JavaScript and AngularJS 
• Experience in developing front-end on ASP.NET MVC back-end is a plus 
• Experience using TypeScript is a plus 
• Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements 
• Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git 
• Strong team player 
• Industry certifications a plus 
• Basic proficiency of English

品質管理系統工程師：
一、職務內容：
1. 創源生技之科學資訊事業部門，乃國內第一家引進世界最先進之企業品質管理與合規系統(EQMS)，推廣於國內各大生技、醫藥、醫材、食品、化工等產業。
2. 您將成為卓越生技資訊團隊的一份子，針對創源客戶之需求，進行品質管理與合規系統之評估介紹、安裝施作、規劃整合、電腦確效、及使用者教育訓練等。
3. 本公司極重視新進工程人員之長期養成，除完整內部產品訓練外，並經常有機會赴歐美等國外原廠受訓，取得原廠認證資格。

[希望您具備]
1. 良好自我時間管理，專業工程師自覺
2. 具良好溝通表達能力，解決問題的熱情與獨立思考能力
3. 懂得取得個人與團隊間的平衡，良好的團隊協作能力
4. 自我學習能力與對新技術的求知慾

[在這裡您可以]
1. 我們重視技術人才的培育與職涯發展，提供內外部技術訓練與交流，透過各階段工作安排與規劃，讓每位同仁擁有個人發展舞台與空間。
2. 我們重視工作氣氛，相互鼓勵， 鼓勵提案改善，不墨守成規，打造活力無限、笑聲不斷、樂在工作的熱血團隊。
3. 我們重視員工生活，以不加班為主要原則，讓您在工作之餘，可以安排個人休閒娛樂，享受工作，樂於生活

二、所需條件：
1. 必須具備良好之中、英文聽、說、讀、寫等溝通與表達能力(面試時需測試)，並具備良好的口語與書信溝通能力及簡報技巧。
2. 對學習新事物有極高興趣，並願意接受跨界跨領域之專業訓練與挑戰。
3. 需有生技、醫藥、醫材、化工廠等品管品保查廠確效等經驗，並熟悉醫藥及品質相關法規如PIC/S、21 CFR、ICH、ISO等。

6. 樂於接觸人群，對以服務產業客戶為導向之資訊工程工作有興趣。

Android APP研發工程師

job_lists.content: • 負責開發 Android用戶端程式。• 參與系統分析、設計、程式撰寫、整合測試。• 驗證、修正測試人員及使用者發現的問題。• 系統設計、程式撰寫須考量其他非功能性需求(如效能、記憶體管理等) 。• 研究並應用符合產品開發需求的最新技術。• 精進原有系統功能/架構。• 主管交辦相關專案業務。

job_lists.title: 遊戲數據統計人員
job_lists.company: 元創科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
1.根據測試計畫與測試案例，進行數據分析。 
2.遊戲系統穩定度監控、遊戲測試、遊戲bug回報、遊戲數據統計
3.將發現的數據Bug清楚提交至Bug管理系統，對該Bug進行追蹤 
4.協助開發團隊進行Bug數據的查詢。 
5.對遊戲數據提出建議。 
6.協助測試與數據驗證比對遊戲平衡(數值面向) 
7.須配合24小時輪班 (夜班另有津貼)
8.主管交辦事項
9.試用期1~3個月不等，保障底薪25000元+全勤1000元，轉正後依照能力給予調薪
10.早班0800-1700、中班1600-0100、夜班0000-0900
11.輪班津貼：中班3000、大夜6000。
12.無經驗可，有經驗薪資可在面議。
13.升遷制度完善透明，每半年考核一次。
14.月休八天
job_lists.skills: 作業系統基本操作、資料備份與復原、資訊設備操作檢修、資訊設備環境設定、系統維護操作、文書處理軟體操作
job_lists.other_condition:
1.團隊合作的精神、正面及專業的態度、追求卓越的熱情、達成目標的承諾、高EQ、責任心 
2.具備測試數據與測試案例的分析、撰寫及執行能力為佳 
3.對數字具有高敏感度
4.抗壓性強，具有責任感 
5.具備優秀的溝通協調能力、個性細心謹慎、邏輯性佳 
6.請在自傳內撰寫對進入遊戲產業之期盼或經歷 
7.無遊戲產業經驗可，有相關工作經驗者優先錄取

job_lists.title: Senior Java Engineer (Taiwan)
job_lists.company: Paktor_新加坡商拍拖有限公司臺灣分公司
job_lists.content:
The projects on our plate are amazing, and we're looking for talented people to meet the exciting technical challenges we face. We're looking for an experienced Java Engineer to contribute to the continual improvement of the Paktor experience for our users. We're open to your ideas for cool interactions and interesting ways to bring people together. The best ideas - from any source - are acted on quickly here. If you're an intelligent and highly ambitious entrepreneur, we want to talk to you! 

Requirements: 
• Experience with Java Spring MVC 
• Deep knowledge of RDBMS (MySQL preferred) 
• Experience with AWS S3, EC2, RDS 
• Experience with Agile programming with scrum, code reviews, rapid iteration 
• Experience with Git 

Bonus points if you have: 
• A BS/MS in Computer Science or Engineering from a top school, but a wonderful project list trumps all 
• Prior start-up experience is awesome (not necessary); being scrappy will help you hit the ground running. 

Benefits:
Competitive salary plus equity 
Health insurance, flexible annual course/training allowance, transport stipends 
Gym memberships, software discounts, free drinks, snacks, and a lot more 
Company sponsored travel across Asia, twice a year 
Brilliant team working on an array of mobile ventures that you have the opportunity to create and shape 
The fast pace and agility of a venture-backed startup 
All the hardware/software/equipment you need, customized however you like 
Great amenities within a great building, and a colorful/creative work environment 

Work Location: Da’anT District Taipei Taiwan

job_lists.title: OF05【乾杯集團】總部 - 資訊課 課員
job_lists.company: 乾杯股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
「感動」由你我創造
我們想提供給客人的，不只有燒肉，而是吃到美食，感受「活著真好」的感動；
以及跟重要的人一起度過美好時光，感受「有彼此真好」的感動；
還有一群不認識的人，剛好在同一個空間裡用餐，感受「緣份真奇妙」的感動。
因為有這些感動，無論發生什麼不開心的事，還是可以笑臉迎接明天。

飲食文化代表當地的風土民情及思想，並牽動著人們的生活。
乾杯集團期許並努力讓日本的飲食文化飄洋過海，
結合了台灣的風土民情，進而形成獨特的風格。
另外，我們認為，乾杯集團是我們與客人一同經營的店，
友好的客人、廠商與朝氣蓬勃的員工都是我們不可或缺的夥伴，
也因此乾杯集團才能如此受到大家歡迎，對我們而言，乾杯集團是屬於大家的！

「乾杯集團 基本理念」
透過餐飲事業培育優秀人才，為全球的飲食文化發展做出貢獻。
1. 提供年輕人成長的地方-
工作與學習並重，讓年輕人找到工作方向、知道自己的存在價值。
2. 提昇台灣餐飲業的水準-
領先味覺的進步，深耕啤酒、紅酒、清酒文化、建立安全舒適的環境及令人感動的服務。
3. 讓世界更美好-
對餐飲起家且引以為傲的同業、想創業並嚮往全球發展的人們發出訊息，引發共鳴。

為了完成我們的乾杯夢，在此募集優秀人才加入我們的行列。
請先投遞履歷，符合職務需求者將儘快與您聯繫並安排面談，
不符職務需求者恕不另行通知，不便之處懇請見諒，謝謝您！

工作內容:
1.IT例行行政庶務
2.USER障礙問題排除
3.公務電腦相關設定
4.主管交辦事項

休假工時及敘薪：
1.工時8小時(另有休息時間1小時) 
2.薪資24000元/月起
※若表現優異 將評估調整薪資/轉任正職

徵的就是你/妳： 
1.熱愛日本文化 
2.活潑熱情且笑容滿分 
3.樂於接受不同風格的嘗試
4.心思細膩且邏輯能力強
5.熟悉電腦、Office軟體基本操作
6.資訊管理相關背景
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

job_lists.title: Business Analyst
job_lists.company: 軒昂有限公司
job_lists.content:
JOB PURPOSE

To define and model business requirements so as to deliver specifications that reflects business needs.

KEY ACCOUNTABILITY AREAS

1. To elicit business requirements from business owners and users to ensure business requirements definition is completed by identifying key business drivers, critical success factors, functional and non-functional requirements, and constraints.
2. To understand and analyze business requirements so as to provide detail plans, gap analysis and/or possible alternative strategies to accomplish goals.
3. To document business requirements from business owners and users to ensure business requirements are properly captured, managed and protected thus ensuring continuity of domain knowledge within the organization.
4. To verify and validate business requirements with business owners and users, to ensure continual relevance and accuracy of business requirements by developing business test cases, constant communication and feedback.
5. To manage all customer driven communications (Account Management) to provide single point of contact for the customers.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

1. To deliver Software Requirements Specifications.
2. To collaborate with implementation team to establish the technical vision and analyze tradeoffs between usability and performance needs.
3. To collaborate with Project Management Office to ensure timely delivery of products that meet business requirements and quality metrics.
4. To collaborate with Service Support Team to ensure IT Service Support meets business operational requirements.

job_lists.title: 軟體測試工程師
job_lists.company: 91APP_九易宇軒股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
91APP 為台灣最大的行動電子商務公司，本職缺在徵求對軟體測試有興趣及熱情的夥伴加入此一蓬勃發展的產業。

91APP 的測試工程師負責以電子商務為核心的各項系統測試工作的計畫與執行。測試平台包含App, Web, Mobile Web, Bot, 以及未來可能出現的各種前端平台與後端系統。

團隊成員必須掌握軟體設計規格，與開發工程師/UX/UI/PM 緊密協作，規劃測試計劃(test plan)，設計測試案例(test case)，以及進行實際測試項目的執行與管理。軟體品質來自整個團隊的緊密協作，測試工程師從一開始的規格制定與討論，到後段的實際測試把關，都扮演重要的角色。

我們歡迎對於測試領域有理想、想創新、想要挑戰複雜的邏輯或對自動化有理想的朋友加入。經手測試的產品，立刻會被數百萬使用者使用，產品穩定度就是工作上無價的成就感!!

==工作技能==
+ 基礎網路知識
+ 電子商務APP系統測試工作的計劃、文件與執行。
+ 熟悉iPhone /iPad/Android/Web 軟體程式測試。
+ 熟悉測試計劃(test plan)的規劃，測試案例(test case)的設計與寫作，及測試執行的管理。
+ 熟悉測試執行工作分配。
+ 熟悉測試平台組態管理。
+ 使用者測試(Usability test)、問題追蹤處理(Bug tracking)。
+ 負責驗證系統功能、相容性、效能、壓力測試、產品可靠度等。
+ 自動化測試平台 (Selenium, Appium, etc.)
+ 一年以上相關軟體測試經驗。
job_lists.other_condition:
==擅長工具==
軟體測試工程師需要不斷學習新的工具與知識，
我們歡迎願意學習的朋友加入我們
熟悉下列工具者尤佳
+Bug tracking system
+自動化測試平台 (Selenium, Appium, etc.)
+基礎程式能力(Python, JavaScript, Java, etc.)

job_lists.title: Garena-系統工程師 Infrastructure Engineer (I004)
job_lists.company: Garena_台灣競舞娛樂有限公司
job_lists.content:
Garena 深信只要抱持著一顆赤子之心及熱情的態度，就能將工作與生活中看似全無關聯的一切串聯起來，鋪設一條通往成功的康莊大道。同時也希望所有具有相同特質及使命感的人，都能加入 Garena，在此實現他們的夢想與目標。

系統管理組包含 MIS 系統工程師、Infra 系統工程師及 Linux 系統工程師，我們負責所有的基礎系統與網路設計與建置、辦公室與遊戲機房的資安管理、外部公司 Event 的 IT 技術支援及各種 IT 相關問題的最終防線。

Infra 系統工程師主要負責的設備都在內湖機房，會時常需要去機房工作，大約一個月會去一次板橋的機房，同時會與助理工程師一同合作。

工作內容
1. 為公司的專案建置高穩定性且完整的網路與系統。
2. 為保持系統的穩定，隨時能夠擴充及優化系統，以支持未來產品的發展。
3. 維護與監控系統的健康狀況並修復出現的任何問題。
4. 管理資訊設備的硬體、軟體資產及庫存。
5. 能夠統整和追蹤專案進度，適時提供使用檔和報告。
6. 探索和驗證新技術，以改進公司的系統設備。

其他條件
1. 資訊/電腦/網路相關領域之大學或研究所學歷。
2. 熟悉 Windows Server 操作系統。
3. 熟悉類 Unix 操作系統（Ubuntu，CentOS 等）。
4. 熟悉服務器硬體，如 CPU，RAM，HDD，Raid 等。
5.  熟悉商業網路硬體和設置。
6. 能夠接受在 Data Center 的環境下工作。
7. 能夠獨立工作，具備較強的環境適應能力。
8. 具有較高的工作效率，良好的溝通能力。
9. 具備快速學習能力，願意接受新的技能和技術。
10. 歡迎應屆畢業生、社會新鮮人申請此職務。
11. 有以下經驗我們將會優先錄取：
o 具有大規模系統網路環境管理經驗。
o 具有存儲與網絡設備的操作經驗。
o 具有 LVM / Snapshots 的操作經驗。
o 具有 Cloud（AWS，GCP 等）的虛擬化的經驗。
o 具有 Nagios，Cacti，Smokeping，Zabbix 等監控工具的經驗。
o 具有Foreman，Puppet，Saltstack和Ansible等自動化工具的經驗。

job_lists.title: Test Analyst
job_lists.company: TomTom Asia_通騰科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Our office is just opposite to the Taipei Main station! Take it easy in the morning, anytime before 10AM is ok.

We are the leading Agile software development company in Taiwan. In Taipei we are looking for a Software Test Analyst who enjoys breaking the systems.

What will you do

• Test planning & test case design, in Story- Feature- and System Levels
• Test execution (manual & automated Tests) & reporting
• Error reporting, analysis and error verification 
• Contributing in Improving & building up E2E test processes 
• Acting as a quality coach within the domain of responsibility and drive a quality aware software development.  

What’s a must

• You get exited by designinig software testing systems and your quality standards are over the top
• Speak your mind, ask questions and share ideas. Even when people do not ask, you like to share what you know.
• 4+ years of directly related proven experience in software testing, especially in test case analysis & design
• Strong skills in requirement and Data analysis for test scope definition and test case creation.
What’s nice to have

• At least Bachelor's in Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Electrical Engineering or an equivalent qualification 
• Ability to code in C++, Java, Python
• ISTQB qualified
• Skills in scripting and working experience in SW Automation frameworks 
• Experience with SW testing management tools and error tracking tools (e.g. Jira, Quality Center/ALM) is an advantage

What can you expect from us

• Freedom, fun, no hierarchy!
• The opportunity to further grow your skills, we pay attention to your career.
• We move fast like a “start-up” but have the benefits of a billion euro company. 
• Team outings, innovation days, indefinite contract, flexible benefits, minimum 15 annual leave days, collective health insurance, health check pension scheme, up to 50% discount on products, bonus scheme. 

What is TomTom

5000 employees worldwide and the majority works in Software engineering. We have been making built-in car navigation since 2008, introduced the connected car in 2010 and are a major player in the area of highly automated driving. Our customers are Renault, Audi, Fiat, Peugot, SsangYong,Toyota and many more.

Pre-employment screening and coding tests of all external candidates is part of the selection process. Feel free to send us a piece of code to show your skills.
job_lists.other_condition: 請上本公司徵才網站: http://www.tomtom.com/careers/jobs/Test-Analyst_JR0000108-3 登錄您的履歷，我們將優先處理，同一職位請勿重覆寄送，並請提供英文履歷及附件。謝謝!

job_lists.title: IT Service Delivery Expert/IT Service Support
job_lists.company: UNDER ARMOUR_台灣安德阿鏌有限公司
job_lists.content:
SDE role is to ensure proper computer operation so that end users can accomplish business tasks. Essential Duties and Responsibilities include the following: 
• Be a critical resource in IT Service Delivery team so that your operation support and analysis skills can be fully utilized
• Demonstrate Strong Customer Service Skills 
• Flexibility to work at different Under Armour locations
• Perform on-site analysis, diagnosis, and resolution of complex desktop/hardware problems for end-users, and recommend and implement corrective solutions, including off-site repair for remote users as needed
• Perform site support and end user training as needed
• Prioritize and schedule local IT activities
• Escalate problems as needed
• Record, track, and document the help desk request problem-solving process, including all decisions made, and actions taken, through to final resolution
• Configure and install all IT equipment for UA teammates
• Perform post-resolution follow-ups to help requests
• User account administrations at all systems
• Evaluate documented resolutions and analyze trends for ways to prevent future problems
• Develop help sheets and frequently asked questions lists for end users
• Various software support with possible vendor assistance 
• Implement and maintain corporate network infrastructure
• Work with functional business partners to properly collect requirements in order to share with infrastructure team to develop the solution.
• Participate contract negotiations and vendor management with local service providers and IT partners
• Participate in Global Service Delivery Governance model and prepare professional  ITIL class documents.
job_lists.other_condition:
1. Bachelor’s Degree from an accredited college or university preferably in IT related field
2. Minimum 5 years in Information Technology
3. Minimum 2 years Helpdesk experience
4. Excellent communication and presentation skills
5. Certifications in multiple technology areas are a significant plus such as Cisco, ITIL, VMware, Microsoft Windows
6. PMP is a plus
7. Cloud computing experience is a plus

job_lists.title: [MS] Consultant(約聘顧問) – .Net application/system development(Services 約聘人員)-105JP
job_lists.company: 萬寶華企業管理顧問股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
找尋有.NET開發經驗工程師
V-Consultants are members of our Consultant Team. This is a global team of exceptional people who deliver world class services with partners, earning customer confidence, trust, and loyalty by helping customers to realize their full potential through accelerated adoption and productive use of Microsoft technologies. V-Consultants will join project teams to work on project assignments at customer sites. To deliver a complete solution to customers as the end goal, team members will be involved in end-to-end project delivery cycle, from requirement confirmation, system analysis, system design, development, test and deployment. All cycles involve customer interactions, team work, presentation, reporting, documentation, and etc. on top of technical tasks. From personal perspective, this is a highly challenging job nature which helps accelerate professional growth and personal values.

- 3年以上相關工作經驗, 熟C, C++, Net Framework, C#, ASP.Net, Web等
上班時間：9點0分∼18點0分
長期派遣，外商公司
job_lists.other_condition:
Qualifications:
- 3+ years related working experience.
- BS or MS degree in Computer Science, Information Engineering, Information Management, or related disciplines.
- Hands on and seasoned skills in C, C++, .Net Framework, C#, ASP.Net, Web Application, Visual Studio are must. Experiences in MVC, SharePoint Server are big plus.
- Competency in Product & Technology Expertise, Analytical Problem Solving, , Confidence, Interpersonal Awareness, Cross-Boundary Collaboration, Building Customer/Partner Relationships, Impact and Influence.
- Below certifications are plus: Microsoft Certified Solution Developer (MCSD) Certification, Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer (MCSE) Certification, Project Management Professional (PMP) Certification.

job_lists.title: 【審計服務】數位鑑識會計資料分析人員 (Forensic Technology & Discovery Services)- Manager/Senior Manager Level
job_lists.company: 安永聯合會計師事務所
job_lists.content: 1. 數位鑑識取證‧ 針對被調查目標(Target)的電子設備(例:電腦硬碟、手機、USB)進行鑑識備份(imaging)，並建立鑑識備份複製本以供進行分析；‧ 進行數位鑑識分析尋找資料，從路由器、伺服器等來源擷取並分析系統資料或審計線索‧ 利用Encase或其他工具從備份硬碟中擷取重要檔案，檢查隱藏及鎖碼檔案‧ 進行鑑識分析:找出可疑使用者行為 (如大量刪除資料、使用率分析)‧ 數據處理、品質管理檢查、檢閱與其他支援2. 數位鑑識分析‧ 數位鑑識分析包含利用關係數據庫(Relativity)、分析及統計工具如SQL、SAS、SPSS及R等分析資料以支援舞弊調查、訴訟及其他案件‧ 進行社群網路分析:進行人際關係分析與關鍵字搜尋‧ 協助建立與修改舞弊風險指標與舞弊風險模型‧ 數據視覺化:將數據資料以數據化工具(如tableau, spotfire)方式呈現3. 其他工作內容‧ 了解並遵循工作環境政策及程序‧ 與工作團隊合作執行案件並隨時向經理報告案件進度‧ 協助準備底稿、表單及報告等用以交付客戶‧ 與客戶發展和保持良好的工作關係‧ 保持有效率、創新及團隊合作的環境。透過協助推廣業務、常態性提供組員正式與非正式訓練與改進現有流程幫助服務成長‧ 訓練/指導組員，檢閱所有組員的工作並確保所有工作流程都被正確的遵循‧ 參與訓練課程等人力發展計畫
job_lists.other_condition: 1.具data mining相關理論知識2.中英文流利3.願意配合出差4.良好溝通與報告撰寫的能力、具備邏輯思考與解決問題的能力5.認真負責、有熱誠、抗壓性與執行力強、具強烈企圖心6.具有溝通與管理技巧、團隊合作與管理能力7.具備程式開發經驗(R, Python, C++.)尤佳8.對刑事/民事訟訴法、證據法則、個人資料保護法、營業秘密法及專利法等有初步了解或有高度興趣者尤佳9.具程式設計與關係性資料庫、統計工具設計與管理相關經驗尤佳10.熟悉數位鑑識軟體如SQL、Server、Oracle、SPSS Clementine、SAS Enterprise Miner、Megaputer、Polyanalyst、Tableau及Oversight尤佳11.熟悉Encase、FTK、HELIX, NUiX等電腦鑑識軟體尤佳12.熟悉ERP系統如SAP、Oracle Financials、Ufida、Kingdee、或PeopleSoft尤佳13.具備資安事件處理與調查或分析經驗、鑑識會計、舞弊偵測調查或eDiscovery調查程序之經驗尤佳14.具備惡意程式分析與調查能力、資訊安全技術、系統強化能力及滲透測試經驗尤佳15.具備專業證照如CFE、CFCE、EnCE 、CCE、CIFI、GCFA、CHFI、ACE等相關電腦鑑識及資訊安全證照尤佳

job_lists.title: Mobile App Developer
job_lists.company: 典益股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
We are looking for a mobile app developer to design, develop, and maintain Android and iOS apps. The developer will work the entire app lifecycle right from concept stage until delivery and post launch support. Apps will be mainly content based and integrated closely with the web site and hardware equipments. In addition to delivering the product the successful candidate will be heavily involved in driving the mobile strategy globally.

Main tasks and responsibilities:
1. Acting as iOS and/or Android developer
2. Deliver across the entire app life cycle - concept, design, build, deploy, test, release to app stores and support
3. Gather requirements around functionality and translate those into elegant functional solutions
4. Build prototypes at tech scoping stage of projects
5. Working along the web developer to create and maintain a robust framework to support the apps
6. Working with the front end developer to build the interface with focus on usability features
7. Create compelling device specific user interfaces and experiences
8. Optimizing performance for the apps
9. Keep up to date on the latest industry trends in the mobile technologies

Person specifications:
1. Proven commercial software development experience - desktop and mobile
2. Published examples of mobile applications on the App store or the Android market
3. Excellent knowledge in information architecture, human computer interaction and usability design principles
4. Ability to use analytic data and user testing to inform design decision
5. Ability to multi task and good time management skills
6. Ability to work on their own and as a part of the team
7. Excellent scoping and estimation skills
8. Excellent testing / QA skills
9. Excellent communication skills (verbal and written) to liaise with various departments locally and internationally

Essential Skills:
iOS -
 a. Strong OO design and programming skills in Objective-C
 b. Familiar with iOS SDK (UIKit, Cocoa Touch, Core Data, Core Location, etc)
 c. Familiar with xcode
Android -
 a. Strong OO design and programming skills in Java (J2EE/J2ME)
 b. Familiar with the Android SDK
 c. Knowledge of SQLite, MySQL or similar database management system
 d. Familiar with Eclipse
Common -
 a. Understanding of other compiled languages
 b. Experience on web service integration (SOAP, REST, JSON, XML)
 c. Experience of development using web technologies
 d. Good understanding of OO programming and design patterns
 e. Good understanding of HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, and PHP
 f. Experience building web and native apps
 g. Ads integration using 3rd party ad server (DART)
 h. Using version control (e.g. SVN)
 i. Excellent debugging and optimization skills

Desirable Skills:
 a. PHP frameworks (e.g. Zend)
 b. PHP template engines (e.g. Smarty)
 c. Creative design skills
 d. Working with a content management system
job_lists.other_condition:
Competencies for success:
1. Creativity
2. Learning on the Fly
3. Technical Learning
4. Action Orientated
5. Dealing with Ambiguity
6. Presentation Skills
7. Peer Relationships
8. Time Management
9. Written Communications
10. Problem Solving

job_lists.title: 雲端應用工程師
job_lists.company: 迎棧科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
如果你：
相信雲端運算是個趨勢，
認為軟體 License 將會是過去式，
瞭解分享在軟體社群有多重要，
參與過或認識自由軟體的開發，
並且有強烈的使命感要用 open source 來改變世界。

同時你願意鑽研：
linux 的基本操作、軟體的安裝和伺服器的架設，
虛擬化技術、Software-Defined Datacenter，
大型應用服務的建構技術，
最新的程式語言，
邏輯的表達與感性的訴求法。

而你平時：
經常在服務別人，
吃苦耐勞、卻很有生活品味，
虛懷若谷、一直在接受各方面最新的知識，
沒有固定的行為模式、體認到唯一不變的就是一切都在變，
對於別人做得到我們卻做不到的事總是忿忿不平，
同時有很多的夣想，更具備實踐的方法與勇氣。

請給我們一個互相瞭解的機會，主動聯絡我們或是回應我們的邀請。
讓我們一起成長，並且帶領台灣的軟體業突破重圍。

工作技能

1) 熟悉Linux系統的操作與架設，並瞭解 shell script。
2) 具 Linux 及 Open Source 開發經驗為佳。
3) 熟悉 OpenStack, Linux KVM , software-defined network, Ceph 等技術。
4) 瞭解 NoSQL 相關技術。具 MongoDB, Cassandra 開發經驗尤佳。
5) 瞭解 C/C++、Java、Python、Ruby 等程式語言。具 Qt 開發經驗尤佳。
6) 瞭解 PHP、JavaScript 等網頁程式語言。具 Pimple, Symfony, Doctrine, jQuery 開       發經驗尤佳。
7) 瞭解 Puppet 工具。

job_lists.title: Sr. Software developer (Performance/load) -  embedded C/C++/Python
job_lists.company: 網件有限公司
job_lists.content:
Summary Description:
Netgear’s Arlo Home Monitoring group is seeking a highly motivate and detail oriented senior automation software test engineer to join the Arlo QA team. The right candidate for this position is passionate about delivering the best possible experience for our users. Your responsibilities will include to develop automation framework to validate wireless cameras, sensors and router embedded software/firmware as well as to automate API calls to verify backend functionality is desired.

Location: Taipei, Taiwan

Responsibilities:
• Develop performance/load test tools to simulate concurrent streams in multi-threads.
• Web Services performance architecture, scripting, and testing experience and knowledge is a big plus.
• Enforces and expedites quality process by proposing and creating automated testing processes.
• Configures Linux test environments as necessary to support test efforts
• Skills in diagnosing and solving complex problems and providing detailed technical analysis
• Organized and capable to work on multiple tasks efficiently
job_lists.other_condition:
Required skills and experience:
• Bachelor’s degree in computer engineering, electrical engineering or similar technical field required.
• Proficient in UNIX/Linux environments and shell scripting
• 3+ years in load/performance testing experience.
• 3+ years of skills with embedded C/C++ and Python, experience on using Valgrind is a plus.
• Experience working on developing automation framework is a big plus
• Proficient in basic SQL operations knowing AWS DnynamoDB is a plus

job_lists.title: Sr. Security Test Engineer (Arlo Home Monitoring Products)
job_lists.company: 網件有限公司
job_lists.content: Responsibilities: • Create new ways to find and exploit existing production security issues (Ethical Hacking) • Test and validate installed firewalls and intrusion detection systems • Perform vulnerability testing on existing production released firmware and software • Develop test scripts to exploit existing APIs for potential vulnerabilities • Investigate reported intrusion incidents, conduct forensic investigations • Document test findings with detailed steps to reproduce the security issue • Collaborate with development, Ops, QA teams on authentication, authorization and encryption solutions • Evaluate new security test technologies and processes that enhance finding potential security issues • Test security solutions using industry standard analysis criteria • Monitor changes in design for security issues during each stage of a project’s lifecycle • Train team members on security test methods
job_lists.other_condition:
Required skills and experience:
• Bachelor’s degree in a technical field required.
• Must be fluent in English – spoken and written
• Has 3+ experience with threat modeling of networked products
• Solid experience in network security protocols, ports and standards
• Extensive working experience in Unix / Linux OS internals, Java applications, network security, identify and token management, and authentication systems
• Demonstrated experience using Ethical Hacking methodology to identify security holes in embedded and/or networked systems
• Highly motivated, organized, work with ambiguity and deliver results on tight schedules.
• Can work independently collaborating frequently with remote teams.

job_lists.content:
一、 學歷:具觀光、旅遊、休閒或相關管理碩士(含)以上。
二、 工作(教學)經驗：
1. 觀光旅遊或休閒運動產業相關工作經驗3年以上（含）。
2. 熟悉:會展獎勵實務、旅遊休閒產業行銷整合規劃、媒體公關、休閒運動指導。

             旅行業實務管理、觀光韓語、健身俱樂部管理、健身教練指導。

job_lists.title: SEO工程師-02
job_lists.company: BLUE PLANET VISTA PHILIPPINES CORPORATION
job_lists.content:
崗位職責：

1.能受練操作SEO排名並獲得搜索流量； 
2.使用站群或黑帽軟件操作SEO並獲得排名及流量； 
3.熟練使用建站軟件及CMS，DEDECMS等,基礎的HTML,CSS,asp,php等代碼撰寫； 
4.完成SEO經理分配的SEO工作任務； 
5.SEO相關的採集軟件,域名及服務器等操作熟練；

崗位要求：

1.有1年以上的SEO全職經驗； 
2.擁有SEO排名及SEO搜索流量案例並可查看； 
3.擁有站群或黑帽SEO經驗並實際操作過醫療BC等行業關鍵詞排名； 
4.熟悉利用各種站群軟件或黑帽軟件操作排名及搜索流量（泛站等不限手段）； 
5.工作認真負責,有責任心,有團隊合作精神；

基本待遇：

1.試用期3個月：130500P（約當台幣8萬）/月， 轉正之後（底薪會漲10%—25%），享有季度分红 
SEO工程師專員工作滿1年後,根據能力及業績進行考核,考核通過後可自行组建SEO小團隊！在工作期間有重大流量突破及SEO能力可提前
2.享受由菲律賓政府頒佈的各類公休假以及特别非工作日的假期，工作年滿一個自然年（試用期第一天起算），可享有一次15個自然日的年假，且補助20000P的年假補貼 
3.公司根據菲律賓移民局要求，為員工辦理臨時工簽、工簽等確保員工工作合法性 
4.公司提供菲律賓政府要求的三險（SSS, Philhealth, Pagibig），提供帶薪福利假且给予100000p/次醫療費用報銷 
5.宿舍為酒店式公寓，包菲傭和包乾洗衣物服務，公司自有物業兩層共100套公寓（2017年底建成），提供員工持股機會 
6.公司成立圖書庫, 可以免費借閱, 或是購書, 希望員工藉此提昇自我；並提供菲語，英語語言教育訓練，讓員工獲得更多的學習機會 
7.公司持有pagcor牌照，辦理9G工作簽證，保證員工的合法身份 
8.2016年已發放24個月薪水，享受TUP股權分红，高薪獎金福利僅此一家
9.公司内外部皆不保留任何護照跟真實姓名，保護員工資訊安全

job_lists.title: IT-SAP-First Line Support (NXP. Kaohsiung)
job_lists.company: NXP Semiconductors Taiwan Ltd._台灣恩智浦半導體股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
The first line support acts as single point of contact for global end-user community, local Application Management process and call handling. Pro-actively assists end-users and resolves problems within own capability. Filters problems likely to be solved locally on site from typically incidents to be routed to the Second Line Support; Hub of known experienced knowledge source (e.g. business process, way-of-working) to guide end-users; Definition of requirements (change requests), testing, acceptance and local implementation of application & business process changes; (New) end-user training.

Essential Job Functions
•Order evaluation and daily order handling, follow up order progress/delivery.
•SAP /Adexa for order handling concern (Process order creating /released/ TR, TO for component picking up, goods issued, goods receiving, to order completion)
•New order flow/business set up support. Drive for incident resolution and improvement.
•UAT (User Acceptance Test) for CR (Change Request) support. Support towards reporting and training.
•Outcome oriented - maximizing balance of effort vs benefit to achieve objectives.  
•Ability to effectively communicate across the organizations and clearly articulate ideas but more importantly, willingness to listen to others
•Partnering with the Business: Understanding the business, translating business issues into IT solutions, influencing the business, helping it to transform
•Architectural Thinking: Seeing connections, zooming in to the detail and zooming out to the bigger picture, and thinking in structures and processes
•Understanding and Delivering IT: Customer focus, meeting their demands and understanding and exploiting technology
•Willingness to occasional overwork on week-end in case of urgent business demands.
•Proficient using Word, PowerPoint and Excel
•Demonstrates excellent communication skills both verbally and in writing in English and Chinese.

job_lists.title: 網站後端工程師
job_lists.company: 威許移動股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
✔ 網站後端工程師：

基本條件：
(1) 重視團隊合作並尊重不同型態的夥伴。
(2) 勇於追求新技術、新設計思維。
(3) 須懂得至少一套後端語言與 Database ( 例如：PHP / MySQL )

加分條件 ( 非必要條件 )：
(1) 熟悉任 PHP 與任一 PHP Web Framework 者更佳 ( 例如：Codeigniter / Yii / Laravel / Zend / Phalcon / CakePHP / Symfony )。
(2) 熟悉任一種 API 資料交換格式者更佳 ( 例如：JSON / XML )。
(3) 擁有 EC 電子商務網站開發經驗者更佳。
(4) 擁有 MVC 開發經驗者更佳。
(5) 熟悉雲端伺服器者更佳 ( 例如：Azure / Amazon / Linode )。
(6) 善用 Paas 服務者更佳 ( 例如：Parse / Heroku )。

年均不到 30 的新創公司，卻發展出數百萬人使用的 APP 服務，
我們要的就是有熱情、有夢想的你，加入我們的行列！

(一) 威許移動主要產品與服務：

✔ Qsire ─ 客製化商品設計與交易平台 ( 獲選 App Store 最佳新 App )。
✔ WishMall ─ 百貨商場與零售業 O2O 解決方案。
✔ WishView ─ 百貨商場與零售業 Mobile ERP 解決方案。
✔ WishOrder ─ 行動化餐飲訂購服務。

(二) 產品與服務描述：

---------------------
► Qsire
---------------------
我們相信，每個人都是獨特的個體，而你生活中的一切，也該獨一無二！在 Qsire 你可以親自參與商品的設計過程，讓每個環節加入你喜愛的元素，盡顯個人風采。Qsire 於 2015/11 上線，獲得【 App Store 最佳新 App 】殊榮！你可以在這裡設計專屬於自己的 3D 列印手機殼！我們將持續導入新的客製化商品 ( 服飾 / 鞋帽 / 包包 ... )，發展全球視野的服務。

---------------------
► WishMall
---------------------
虛實整合已成為百貨與零售業的發展趨勢，威許移動為新光三越、遠東百貨、誠品書店、屈臣氏、潤泰 CityLink 創新商場、遠雄 U-TOWN 購物中心、北京金融街購物中心、重慶協信購物中心 ... 等，發展各式各樣的 O2O App 應用，透過行動化特性提供便捷服務 ( 虛擬會員卡、行動購物、電子優惠券、餐廳訂位 )，近期更應用 Beacon 技術，實現近端感知與行銷互動，並用於巡檢與查核作業。

---------------------
► WishView
---------------------
透過行動設備發展移動式管理策略，建構行動化的營運績效管理系統、事件回報通知系統、部門群組溝通系統；透過安全加密的權限控管機制，即時連入企業 ERP 網路查詢營運數據並取得視覺化分析圖表，結合通報系統接收突發訊息，並以內部溝通群組傳遞指示與應對策略。

---------------------
► WishOrder
---------------------
全臺第一個行動點餐服務 MOS Order ( 摩斯漢堡 )，自 2012 年推出以來，獲得使用者廣泛支持，已突破百萬次下載！每天都有成千上萬的用戶，透過這款服務訂購喜愛餐點。威許移動更在 2014 年與優質的飲料連鎖店「大苑子茶飲」合作，協助大苑子發展行動訂購飲料服務，並設計優惠券等行銷機制，掀起一波波秒殺與搶換風潮。

威許移動開發的 APP 都能獲得使用者四到五顆星的高度評價，過去三年間，我們開發的 APP 累計已突破 370 萬次下載，協助品牌企業客戶提供更好的行動化服務給終端消費者。威許移動不只是開發程式，更強調使用者體驗，我們重視流程設計、介面設計、視覺設計 ( Flow Design / UI Design / Visual Design )，為的是提供更好的使用體驗！威許移動持續提供穩定服務與高度品質，協助客戶發展長期的行動化策略！我們相信行動化既是趨勢，更能強化顧客關係、增加企業營收、降低企業營運成本、強化營運績效。

誠摯邀請年輕的你，加入這個「‎新創」事業體，跳出「舊世代」的包袱，一起追求成長，一起創造價值！

job_lists.title: 【顧問部】經理 (金融行業顧問 金融資訊顧問)-311A
job_lists.company: KPMG_安侯建業聯合會計師事務所
job_lists.content: 1. 進行資料分析服務平台研究開發2. 資訊技術研究與規劃3. 協助資料分析服務業務之推動，簡報與服務建議書撰寫4. 負責跨產業或合作夥伴之溝通與協調5. 對客戶進行服務相關技術說明
job_lists.other_condition: 1. 大學以上畢，資訊相關科系2. 具備3年以上系統開發工作經驗，熟悉常見資訊系統架構與平台3. 具資訊系統企劃、分析或軟體產品的協銷（presale）經驗4. 具下列任一經驗者尤佳：a.具關聯資料庫與SQL經驗，有Data Warehouse經驗者b.有使用Python或R程式語言的經驗5. 具英文溝通能力，並可適應快速學習的工作環境6. 具抗壓性，能配合加班及出差安排(含國外)7. 能多工處理並妥善安排工作項目

job_lists.title: 【顧問部】經理/協理 (金融行業顧問 資料科學家)-311A
job_lists.company: KPMG_安侯建業聯合會計師事務所
job_lists.content: 1. 面對客戶討論問題，並與客戶一起激盪出，有創意且基於資料分析的解決之道2. 用適當的程式工具蒐集匯整資料，以統計與機器學習手法分析資料，尋求解決問題的方案3. 設計資料分析服務的方法與流程4. 帶領團隊進行較大規模的資料分析工作5. 協助資料分析服務業務之推動，簡報與服務建議書撰寫
job_lists.other_condition: 1. 碩士以上畢，數學系/統計系/資料科學/資訊工程等相關科系2. 相關資訊領域的碩士並在資料分析與探勘領域擁有５年以上經驗， 或是具有資訊或統計博士學位，論文研究為相關領域者  （大學數學系，碩士資訊領域者尤佳）3. 對實證研究或解決關於資料的困難課題有強烈熱情4. 有能力駕輕就熟的使用Python或Hadoop(Java)等程式語言5. 有關聯資料庫與SQL經驗者，有Data Warehouse經驗者尤佳6. 擁有R、MATLAB或SAS/SPSS或Tableau等分析工具的專業知識 7. 面對客戶簡報資料分析經驗豐富8. 熟悉非結構資料架構

job_lists.title: Data Specialist
job_lists.company: 美商法里亞有限公司臺灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Please refer to our website: https://fariaedu.com/

- Does this describe you?
Ability to learn quickly and execute quickly
Excellent aesthetic and web design sense
Meticulous attention-to-detail
Knowledge of formatting and layout principles (e.g. cropping an image proportionally)
Strong Excel and spreadsheet skills (e.g., formulas and shortcuts knowledge)
Ability to complete assigned tasks reliably through to completion
Strong emotional intelligence and grace under pressure
Proficient in English language
Very resourceful in gathering data through the Internet


- Key Responsibilities
Over the course of a normal week, these would be some of the things that you would do:

1. Form Building
Create online forms that match schools’ existing forms using our WYSIWYG form editor.
Crop and upload high-quality pictures to appear on schools’ landing pages.
Perform reviews of peers’ form builds to ensure no mistakes make it to the customer.

2. Data Imports
Use formulas and keyboard shortcuts in a spreadsheet editor to prepare data from schools for upload into our products.

3. Customer Support
Respond to customer support requests with polite, easy-to-understand step-by-step instructions on how to use our products.

4. Bug Reporting
Reproduce and report bugs for the development team to fix.

5. Schools Data Gathering
Collecting schools’ information from any resources (E.g., Wikipedia, Google,IBO, CIS, etc).


- Evaluation Criteria
Your performance will be evaluated based on the following criteria, please carefully consider the following points.

A. General Work
- Schedule: You arrive at the ofﬁce to start your day on-time and keep a good work schedule in sync with the rest of the team.
- Reliability: Your work is carried out with care from start to ﬁnish. If you say you will ﬁnish a build, you will get it done the right way the ﬁrst time.

B. Building
- Forms: You are able to build forms with care by meticulously matching the layout and sequence of the ﬁelds and by inputting ﬁeld labels precisely.
- Pages: You know how to lay out information optimally, how to align text and images, how to organize header and paragraph text so that contact looks good on the Web.
- Design & Style: You have a good sense of aesthetics. If a school’s colors are all blue, you know that it is probably not a good idea to insert pink or red - colors that would not ﬁt well. You know how to crop an image properly, and you can spot excess white space a kilometer away.
- Grammar & Spelling: You are excellent at spotting typos and grammatical mistakes. You always know to use spell check and to double-check your work before asking someone to review it.

C. Exports and Imports
- Speed: You use shortcuts and formulas to speed up your work.
- Accuracy: No mistakes exist in your imports, and all points of uncertainty are outlined clearly in your notes for the customer.

D. Communication
- Responsiveness: You reply promptly to requests from customers and the sales team.
- Clarity: Your bug reports and notes to coworkers, management, and customers are well-written and cover all points of uncertainty so that everyone is on the same page.

- Benefits
Salary negotiable, with annual bonuses tied to performance
Unlimited book purchase

我們利用機器學習 (Machine Learning) 和統計模型 (Statistical Modeling) 從海量數據 (Big Data) 中挖掘各式使用者行為和能付諸行動的洞見與觀察 (Actionable Insights)，進而建立數據產品 (Data Products)，將其應用在廣告投放，電商成效優化、O2O 等各種領域。我們希望建置一個由電腦科學家、統計學家和心理學家等跨領域組成的數據科學團隊 (Data Science Team)，深信著 “Data Drives Transactions”。
團隊的發展重點為廣告競價平台 (Real-Time Bidding Demand-Side Platform) 、數據管理平台 (Data Management Platform)，團隊的使命是幫助企業提升顧客終生價值 (Customer Lifetime Value)。

[You are...]
歡迎對機器學習和統計數據分析有高度興趣、喜歡團隊合作，又能獨當一面的你加入，一起打造最領先的數據產品，用數據推動商業世界！

[Your jobs...]
#1 應用大數據分析技術對智慧型手機用戶行為進行分析，為各級管理層提供資料支援
#2 研發先進資料處理技術: 建立統計模型、開發資料分析演算法及相關資料結構設計
#3 國際參考文獻探勘
job_lists.other_condition:
[You must have...]
#1 電腦科學、機器學習、數學、統計等相關專業。
#2喜歡行動產業，對待資料認真、謹慎。
#3對資料有高度敏感性與高度熱情，能團隊合作，有良好人際溝通能力。
#4具有足夠程式設計能力，可實作新穎統計分析方法。
#5 熟悉或可快速學習大數據處理相關技術與工具，如：SQL、Spark、Python、Java、Scala。

job_lists.content: 工作職責：• 負責調研及實現大資料軟體及系統架構• 協同研究人員進行演算法解決方案的系統化、程式化實現以及性能優化。• 協同開發人員進行演算法解決方案的產品化實施與集成。
job_lists.other_condition: 職位要求：• 電腦科學/軟體工程/資訊科技或相關專業，碩士以上學歷。• 至少3年以上Unix/Linux作業系統下商用Java的程式設計與開發經驗。• 對電腦數據結構與演算法有較為深刻的理解。• 熟悉開發框架，尤其是各種Spring框架。• 熟悉資料庫，如MySQL、Oracle等。• 優秀快速的學習能力，對學習新技術充滿熱情。• 優秀的口頭與書面交流與表達能力。• 善於獨立完成工作，同時具備良好的團隊協作能力。• 具備以下任一領域知識與經驗者優先考慮：–  人工智慧技術，如自然語言處理、機器學習、資料採擷、知識圖譜、或圖像識別。–  大資料技術，如Hadoop、Spark、 Solr/Elastic Search、或MongoDB等。–  多執行緒開發經驗、分散式運算、或GPU程式設計。

job_lists.title: 人工智慧科學家 / 資深人工智慧科學家（臺北）
job_lists.company: 香港商慧科訊業有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
工作職責：
方向一：深度學習
• 從事深度學習與機器學習相關技術的研究。
• 提出基於深度學習技術的演算法方案，解決自動化中文自然語言處理與理解中的挑戰。
• 與開發工程師合作以實現新技術的轉移與產品化。
方向二：自然語言處理與語意分析
• 從事自然語言處理、語意分析、及知識圖譜相關技術的研究。
• 演算法研究與設計，涉及實體識別、關係抽取、語意消歧、實體連結、以及知識圖譜構建、推理及挖掘等。
• 與開發工程師合作以實現新技術的轉移與產品化。
job_lists.other_condition:
職位要求：
• 電腦科學與工程或相關專業，優秀的學術成績。
• 資深人工智慧科學家：需要博士學位，及3年以上博士後研究經驗。
• 人工智慧科學家：需要博士學位、或碩士學位加3年以上研究經驗。
• 具備傑出的數學與推理能力並對研究方法有良好的認知。
• 具備下述至少一個研究領域的知識與經驗（深度學習、自然語言處理、語意分析、文本挖掘、機器學習、或知識圖譜等）。
• 熟悉Linux開發環境，精通至少一門程式設計語言(Java或Python)。
• 具備中文自然語言處理的研究經驗與技能將會優先考慮。
• 優秀的口頭與書面交流與表達能力。
• 善於獨立完成工作，同時具備良好的團隊協作能力。

1.各項建置專案之資安 、Infrastructure的評估、規劃、請購、建置及維護

3.TSM平台安全認證與管理:弱點掃描、入侵偵測作業、後續追蹤處理與安全技術改善4.HSM和KMS系統維運與管理，以及安全金鑰相關作業執行
5.系統規劃設計並製作、設計技術操作手冊及表單

• 3年以上資訊或電信相關工作經驗，並具2年以上專案執行經驗
• 熟悉PCI DSS、EMV、ISO-27001等安全認證規範
• 熟悉Smart Card相關金鑰管理系統(Key Management System)
• 熟悉UNIX/LINUX系統管理、網路與Firewall設定管理、MySQL DB
• 孰悉專案管理方法及流程，並會使用專案管理工具，如 MS Project
• 具晶片信用卡、悠遊卡或金融資料交換等整合相關經驗者尤佳
• 孰悉NFC行動支付、TSM、Smart Card、電信加值服務技術尤佳
• PMP Certification is a plus
其他能力:
• 頭腦靈活，表達力強
• 具溝通協調能力，可整合各單位需求並解決專案問題
• 熟悉並具備簡報及文件撰寫技巧
• 態度積極進取、具責任感
•       具溝通協調能力，整合各單位需求，提出適合方案

job_lists.content:

集團是在菲律宾合法注册的新加坡外商公司，主要经营网路线上游戏，團隊成員來自新加坡、台灣 、 泰國 、馬來西亞 、越南、菲律賓、韓國，是一個年輕有活力的團隊，在業界以多元化工作環境和新穎產品享譽卓著；我們的產品已成功行銷至東南亞 、 東北亞 、 歐洲 、 北美等多國，獲得市場一致的喜愛及信賴。
歡迎您加入我們，與各國的優秀工作者一同成長!

工作內容：
1 整體提升公司網站互聯網搜索來源流量
2 建立完整的SEO工作體系
3 督導SEO專員完成公司預計的目標
4 提高SEO渠道客戶轉化率
5 對公司所有網絡產品進行SEO優化

1， 遊戲行業SEO兩年以上工作經驗。

4， 熟悉一種或以上的程序語言。
5， 熟悉目錄，單頁站，泛站，鏡像站，站群，泛目錄。
6， 熟悉各大搜索引擎的算法， 精通各大搜索引擎的優化。
7， 具備出色的溝通能力、協調能力和組織能力，較強的邏輯思維、調研及分析能力。

公司福利：
1. 提供競爭力的薪資

job_lists.title: SEO Specialist
job_lists.company: 荃方科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job brief:
The SEO Specialist is responsible for implementing SEO and social media strategies for clients. The SEO Specialist can quickly understand and support initiatives that will contribute to the goals and success of client campaigns.Key Functional Area:
 - Perform keyword research in coordination with client business objectives to optimize existing content and uncover new opportunities
 - Provide SEO analysis and recommendations in coordination with elements and structure of websites and web pages
 - Provide recommendations and execute strategies for content development in coordination with SEO goals – general and keyword specific
 - Administer search engine programs (XML sitemaps, shopping feeds, webmaster tools) for purposes of diagnostic reporting on client projects
 - Help to create and support marketing content to socialize and use for social media purposes (e.g. customer videos briefs, customer case studies, blog posts, posts from analysts and copywriter)
 - Assist in development and execution of communication/content strategies via social communities in coordination with SEO goals
 - Keep pace with SEO, search engine, social media and internet marketing industry trends and developments
 - Research and implement search engine optimization recommendations
 - Research and analyze competitor advertising links
 - Develop and implement link building strategy in coordination with client SEO goals
 - Research and administer social media tools in support of clients’ social media strategy
 - Monitor and administer web analytics dashboards, reports and key reporting tools, and point out key areas of importance in accordance client goals
 - Monitor and evaluate search results and search performance across the major search channels
 - Communication to team and management on project development, timelines, and results
 - Work closely with the other team members to meet client goals

Professional Competencies
 - Passion for SEO and internet marketing
 - Outstanding ability to think creatively, and identify and resolve problems
 - Attention to detail and the ability to effectively multi-task in a deadline driven atmosphere
 - Ability to clearly and effectively articulate thoughts and points
 - High levels of integrity, autonomy, and self-motivation
 - Excellent analytical, organisational, project management and time management skills
job_lists.skills: 品牌知名度推廣、社群媒體經營管理
job_lists.other_condition:
Professional Skills & Qualifications
 - In-depth experience with website analytics tools (Baidu, Google Analytics, are MUST have, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends are plus)
 - Proven 2 – 3 years experience in Search Engine Marketing (SEM) and Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
 - Solid understanding of performance marketing, conversion, and online customer acquisition
 - Experience working with CMS and building/administering content in CMS environments
 - Experience with A/B and multivariate experiments is plus.
 - Proficiency in MS Excel, PowerPoint, and Word
 - Desired: Knowledge of HTML/CSS, JavaScript and website administrations

job_lists.title: 軟體測試工程師 QA Engineer
job_lists.company: 荃方科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
In project design phase, The QA will work closely with the UX designer and the product manager,assist in gathering and document requirements, including functional requirements and content requirements .
When development and content preparation are complete, the QA tester will coordinate one or more rounds of testing, collecting feedback to deliver to the web developer for troubleshooting.
This process will be repeated as necessary until the site is ready for launch.
 
Responsibilities:
- Have a sense of ownership for the quality of each software release.
- Write documentation, such as test reports, guides and manuals.
- Produce highly accurate wireframe documentation and other specifications required to implement design.
- Prepare test environment, test scenarios, data and test scripts.

●More than 3 years experience testing web applications.
●Experience testing with web browsers, such as IE, Firefox, and Chrome
●Hands-on troubleshooting experience
●Good attitude, patience, detailed/thorough, & able to work under tremendous pressure
●Experience with Axure RP is plus.

[基本需求]：

job_lists.title: Senior Software Quality Assurance Engineer
job_lists.company: 台灣美光晶圓科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: As a Quality Assurance Engineer, you will be responsible for development, implementation, and execution of all test procedures and processes. This includes creation and management of test data sets to validate mainstream and edge scenarios through manual and automated testing. You will be closely working with Mobile and Web App development teams to ensure thoughtful planning and test execution to facilitate a smooth hand off to production.Responsibilities:•  Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases•  Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities•  Design, develop and execute automation scripts.•  Identify, document and track bugs•  Track quality assurance metrics
job_lists.other_condition: Qualifications and Experience:As a Quality Assurance Engineer, you will be responsible for development, implementation, and execution of all test procedures and processes. This includes creation and management of test data sets to validate mainstream and edge scenarios through manual and automated testing. You will be closely working with Mobile and Web App development teams to ensure thoughtful planning and test execution to facilitate a smooth hand off to production.Responsibilities:•  Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases•  Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities•  Design, develop and execute automation scripts.•  Identify, document and track bugs•  Track quality assurance metricsQualifications and Experience:•  Minimum of 5 years’ experience as a QA engineer•  Strong knowledge of QA methodologies, tools and processes.•  Hands on experience with industry test tools such as TFS, hpQC is a plus.•  Very good communication skills•  Experience working in an agile/scrum development process is a plus.•  Experience on mobile apps testing is a plus.•  English speaking skills (TOEIC > 650 recommended)  Education: Bachelor's degree in Information Systems or Computer Science.

job_lists.title: Data Engineer
job_lists.company: 台灣美光晶圓科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: Job Description:As a Data Engineer at Micron Technology Inc., you are a key member of a cross-functional team responsible for developing and growing Micron’s methods and systems for extracting new insight for our expanding data streams. You will collaborate with various roles and teams across the enterprise to design and implement systems to extract data from Micron’s manufacturing, R&D and engineering systems, transforming it into an actionable format, and as needed, creating dynamic presentation layers for use by high-level engineers and managers throughout the company.
job_lists.other_condition: Qualifications:3+ years of experience in ANY TWO of the following: • Proficient with one or more Data Extraction Tools (SSIS, Informatica, SAP BODS, etc.).• Proficient with one or more high-level client, object-oriented language (e.g., C#, C++, JAVA, Python, Perl, etc.). • Proficient with one or more web programming language (PHP, MySQL, Python, Perl, JavaScript, ASP, etc.).• Solid Software development experiences• Data management systems, including Oracle, MS SQL, Teradata, and NoSQL • BI tool experience (MDX, Integration Services, Analysis Services, Reporting Services, SharePoint, Business Objects, or Tableau) • Software architecture (data structures, data schemas, etc.)• Developing, automating, and managing an ecosystem of ETL processes• Multiple operating systems (e.g., MS Office, Unix, Linux, etc.) • Experience with Agile practices is a plus• Familiarity with SAP/ABAP is a plus • Good communication skills in EnglishEducation:• Bachelor’s degree and above in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Applied Mathematics or related field.

job_lists.title: EBS Senior Software Engineer
job_lists.company: 台灣美光晶圓科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: As an IT Software Engineer at Micron you will configure, develop, maintain and support Micron and third party applications and servers. You will create and analyze software/server specifications, and research, design, document, modify, and support software throughout the development life cycle. You must demonstrate the functional and technical skills necessary to switch between development technologies and merge them to provide the best solution. You must have a demonstrated ability to create quality software and participate in quality improvement efforts. You will provide solutions that create business value while at the same time minimizing negative impact through defects, downtime, or performance degradation. Responsibilities:•  Analyze business needs to understand the problem and estimate values.•  Analyze/implement the home grown software or 3rd party solutions.•  Follow the software development lifecycle to deliver solutions.•  Maintain systems/servers by keeping them tuned and compliant with company standards.•  Provide system/server security and access.•  Provide 24x7 escalation support for software/server issues. Qualifications:•  The ability to work in several areas of software development as part of a team or independently.•  Strong analytical, problem solving, and organizational skills.•  The ability to work in a dynamic, fast-paced, 24x7 work environment.•  The ability to manage multiple projects and tasks concurrently.•  Self-motivated with the ability to work with minimal supervision.•  Excellent customer service and communication(verbal and written) skills.•  Active team participation and demonstrated teamwork and consensus building skills Experience: 3 year experience in any of the following: •  Windows/Web base development with C#•  Windows Server administration•  SQL Database administration and TSQL/SSIS scripting•  SAP/ABAP development (optional)•  Experience working in an agile/scrum development process•  English speaking skills (TOEIC > 500 recommended)   Education: Bachelors Degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or Information Systems

job_lists.title: [KKBOX] Sr. Research Engineer_Data Engineering
job_lists.company: 願境網訊股份有限公司_KKBOX
job_lists.content: At KKBOX, we are building a big data analytics workflow in the cloud by leveraging open source technologies like Hadoop and Spark. We provide a reliable platform for both Researching and Engineering teams to gain product and consumer insights from a large scale data-warehouse. Tens of millions of events are processed daily and the volume is climbing rapidly as we grow our global subscriber base. This generates big data, and our team is responsible for driving the business forward by leveraging these rich data sources. If you want to work with multi-billion row datasets on a daily basis to deliver insights to business partners, this is the role for you!We are seeking a talented software engineer to work on the tools and microservices that make up our big data platform. You will focus on building Hadoop/Spark workflows and platforms upon which our teams build, deploy, and run their tasks and researches. Whether it is building tools to allow for better exploration of the data, creating services to help coordinate work on the platform, or creating new ways to write software that is simple yet powerful, we have a lot of exciting problems to solve and many smart people to work with while we make KKBOX the best place to enjoy music worldwide.*Responsibility- Build Hadoop/Spark workflow.- Ensure maintenance and reliability of the Continuous Integration (CI) environment.- Assist and support downstream maintainer activities.- Monitor Amazon Web Services (AWS) performance.*Requirement- Proven programming expertise. (Java, Scala or Python)- Proficient in Linux systems and Git. (Experiences on AWS is a plus)- Strong knowledge of CI, testing frameworks, and networking-related technologies.- Experiences on Hadoop/Spark ecosystem.
job_lists.other_condition: Required skills:- Experience in Hadoop/Spark ecosystem.- Proficient in Linux, Unix systems, and Git.- Experience in CI.- Expertise with testing frameworks (Jenkins, AutoTest, or equivalent).- Proven shell or other scripting expertise; Java or Python programming experience is a plus.- Ability to develop and implement test plans.- Good communication skills.- Experiences on AWS is a plus.

job_lists.title: 資訊安全管理師 Information Security Administrator
job_lists.company: 好市多股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
To support the overarching values and business goals of Costco Wholesale as they relate to meeting legal, ethical and regulatory obligations; protecting member privacy; and maintaining a security technology environment for our operations. The Information Security Administrator provides consultative services, works with vendors for product consideration and recommendation, performs monitoring and auditing of information system activities, creates and maintains documentation related to policies, standards and procedures; and, mentors team members with lesser subject matter expertise.

Be responsible to determine and establish the approach by which IS GRC(Governance, Risk & Compliance) will manage and govern risk and compliance. This includes agreeing to a framework with internal stakeholders for reporting on progress versus objectives on a regular basis, which includes the design, collation, review, analysis, distribution and communication of the framework.
job_lists.other_condition:
-Ability to work effectively, independent of assistance
-Innovative, creative, and extremely responsive, with a strong sense of urgency
-Willing to share knowledge and assist others in understanding technical and business topics
-Willingness to work outside of regular business hours as required which can include evenings, weekends and holidays
-Experience with firewalls, routers, load balancers and DMZ silos, and packet capture technologies helpful
-Working knowledge of information systems security standards and practices (e.g., access control and system hardening, system audit and log file monitoring, security policies, and incident handling)
-Working knowledge of protocols and technologies such as TCP, UDP, SSL/TLS.
-At least one technical certification related to a major Costco platform (Microsoft, Linux or Cisco)
-Ability to interpret information security data and processes to identify potential compliance issues (SOX, HIPAA, PCI)
-Ability to quickly understand security systems in order to identify and validate security requirements using logical, risk based prioritization methods
-Willing to relocate to China for long term

job_lists.title: Global Support Center-Software Engineer
job_lists.company: (ASML)台灣艾司摩爾股份有限公司
job_lists.content: As a GSC engineer you are in charge to solve complex technical problems within your competency: Software. You are owner of the problems that were not solved by our local expert teams at customer site. The difficulties of technical problems are diverse with the phase of the systems maturity. Therefore you will face a challenging set of tasks and responsibilities:As a GSC engineer you are in charge to solve complex technical problems within your competency: Software. You are owner of the problems that were not solved by our local expert teams at customer site. The difficulties of technical problems are diverse with the phase of the systems maturity. Therefore you will face a challenging set of tasks and responsibilities:1. Solving complex technical problems by remote analyzing data and creating deterministic forward looking action plans is key for a GSC Engineer; 2. Good alignment on expectations with the local team and your other GSC colleagues worldwide; 3. Involving additional help from development engineers helps to drive fast incident resolution; 4. On-site support when required to solve the problem at the customer site; 5. Start prevention process: Next to solving a technical problem a GSC engineer is responsible to start the process to prevent the issue of happening again in future. Collaboration with the departments such as CS Service Engineering is necessary to establish that goal;6. Managing (technical) escalations, secure that the right data is available and provide routine updates to management and stakeholders;7. Sharing knowledge and expertise amongst colleagues within the GSC and with local engineers increases the efficiency of our customer service. Travelling on-site when new system types are introduced to customers is an example of this aspect.  The diversity of technical problems encountered in the “Software” team requires a broad knowledge level. This makes that a GSC Software engineer interfaces a lot with other competences and Development and Engineering (D&E). A GSC software engineer grows very valuable general system knowledge. For this reason a job within this team is an excellent starting position for a career in a high tech environment. Growth possibilities in both technical and managerial directions can be thought of.
job_lists.other_condition: Software CompetenceAs a GSC Software engineer you will be responsible to troubleshoot & resolve issues related to equipment problems in the sub-competences: Computer Systems, being hardware and software; Data handling /Configuration tooling and Lot Operations embedded in automation and reporting. You will be analyzing the error log/ computer codes and will reproduce the error codes in an offline workstation. As a software engineer you will also coordinate adaptations and integrate patches. You will analyze the gaps and interact a lot with other competences and D&E. Basically you’ll often be the first point of contact in case the problems aren’t clearly related to a specific competence. This requires a strong analytical skill-set combined with clear and understandable communication.Educational LevelMaster degree in technical science (Physics, Mechatronics, Electronics, Chemistry, Aerospace Engineering, Process technology, etc.) We are also open for bachelors with 2-5 years of experience.ExperienceWe are open for recently graduated engineers but also experienced engineers in a technical problem solving environment/ customer support experience.Knowledge of ASML equipment on a specialized technical level is an advantage but not a necessity.Affinity with Software issues is required; however this position doesn’t require hardcore coding skills. Knowledge about UNIX coding is an advantage!  Personal Skills• “Get things done” mentality;• Strong analytic and abstract capability;• Pro-active initiating attitude;• Flexible in working hours, work environment and travel on short notice (sometimes the same day)• Ability to work in a highly pressured environment; • Independent;• Team worker;• Strong communicator in English (Verbal and Written) (Dutch is a practical advantage);• Good social skills; • Customer-oriented;• Ability to plan and set priorities.The diversity of problems in a fast evolving company requires a continuous drive to stay updated and informed on new technologies, functionalities and products. Being eager to learn and absorb this knowledge are very valuable within GSC.

job_lists.title: 測試助理工程師 (QA)
job_lists.company: 中菲行國際物流股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description:
Software Quality Assurance Engineer will own quality assurance to deliver top quality for internal web system (ERP System). 

Tasks include:
-Generate, maintain, and manage software test cases
-Define test plan and monitor test schedule
-Execute test cases. Report software issues on bug tracking system
-Work with the engineering team to validate and resolve the issues
-Monitor, coordinate, report, and follow up quality status during the development and production stages

Qualification:
- Familiar with Software development life cycle, knowledge of software testing and project management
-Prior experience in software testing and quality assurance is a plus
-Experience in logistic industry is a plus
-Good communication skills in English (written and verbal) and interpersonal skills.
- Self-motivated and self-directed, a proven desire to work as a team member, both on the same team and outside of the team
- Be detail, careful, positive thinking 


工作職稱:
- 網頁測試助理工程師

工作內容:
- 驗證系統功能、確認規格功能項目
- 規劃、撰寫測試計畫及測試案例 (Test Case)
- 整理回報測試結果協助工程師除錯來提升系統品質
- 主管交辦事項

工作條件:
- 無經驗可，歡迎大學畢業生
- 如具備軟體測試經驗者，或會使用Bug Tracking system相關系統尤佳
- 熟悉一般office軟體 (Excel, Power Point, Word)
- 良善溝通能力，配合度高，良好邏輯思考能力
- 細心、耐心、學習心、主動積極、獨立作業、有服務熱忱者

job_lists.title: Software Support Technician
job_lists.company: 美商海鷗科技亞太股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
[Our Tech Support Department]
Even though it is free, we consider our technical support to be part of the product we sell and we want it to be the best. We are seeking ambitious, energetic employees who are eager to make a difference in a growing, international company. Our support department employs 28 people worldwide, including 4 support technicians in our Taipei operations.

[Job Description]
You will provide technical support by phone and e-mail to users of our BarTender software and Windows printer drivers.  In addition to your daily support tasks, you will also be expected to perform light IT duties for our Taipei office.  Since our tech support is the first line of communication with our customers, you will also play a vital role in suggesting improvements for our product. 

[Responsibilities] 
•Provide support to customers by identifying, troubleshooting, and resolving technical issues
•Escalate issues to higher support tiers as needed
•Report bugs, questions and feature requests to development
•Test the software and try to create workarounds to meet customer needs
•Research and answer miscellaneous questions about software capabilities from resellers and end users
•Identify and record details about fixes and contribute to documentation and Knowledge Base

Some of the exciting topics you will learn more about while you grow on the job include:

 Database connectivity (including Open Database Connectivity)
 Integrating our product with other applications (using .NET, Visual Basic, C++,           VB Script, ASP.NET, etc…)
 TCP/IP communication (Client/Server)
 Thermal printing technology
 Radio frequency (RFID) tag encoding
 Bar code technology
 Virtual PCs

Please Apply on Company Website: 
https://seagullscientific.clearcompany.com/careers/jobs/e93811df-c810-2b56-3128-de868a2697dd/apply?source=469809-CS-19504

job_lists.title: 演算法軟體工程師（C#）
job_lists.company: 香港商寶時鐘錶企業有限公司台灣分公司(TIME WATCH ENTERPRISE COMPANY LIMITED )
job_lists.content:
演算法軟體工程師（C#）責任
1. 使用科學方法去設計，開發並分析模型和算法，從而使客戶的投資利益達到最大化。
2. 通過與業務團隊的緊密合作而了解各項會影響算法設計與開發的業務需求。
3. 與團隊中其他的數據科學家合作，通過不斷的開發與完善算法原型來驗證初始假設和結果。
4. 確保所開發的算法能夠靈活變動以滿足所有投資組合的業務需求。
5. 分辨並使用合適的測試案例，藉以證明該算法處理邊界條件的能力。
6. 了解數據需求和每個算法所需的數據量，並知悉此數據會對建議算法所產生的影響。
7. 了解多品牌與渠道的複雜性，並確保該算法可以在所有投資組合品牌將利益最大優化。
8. 積極與業務合作夥伴溝通以充分了解業務需求並將其轉化為合適的模型。
9. 與業務和實施團隊一起制定適當程度的文件，意在培養終端用戶對新算法的理解度。
10. 使用有效的科學驗證方法去解決問題;在所提議的解決方法可能無法很好工作的情況下開發有效的測試方案；與庫存戰略和產品管理團隊合作，幫助使用者能夠更好的使用算法。


演算法軟體工程師（C#）要求
1. 學歷要求：運籌學，統計學，工業工程學士學位，並具有較高的的定量和軟件開發技能。碩士/博士級學位優先。
2. 工作經驗要求：具8年以上算法設計及開發經驗，金融學經驗者優先。
3. 具備在極高速和高精準度工作環境下的執行能力。
4. 熟悉統計軟件（如SAS，R，Matlab的），以及數據庫語言（SQL），C#。
5. 有使用Hadoop和MapReduce和/或機器學習包（Mahout，Weka，SVM庫）做大數據分析的背景。
6. 具備與技術和非技術人員清楚的溝通複雜的算法邏輯和分析結果的能力。
7. 表現出積極主動，並可以在少量的監督情況下獨立完成工作。

job_lists.title: Data Scientist
job_lists.company: 先智雲端數據股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
The goal of our team at ProphetStor is to build a business world that is driven by science. To achieve this goal, we focus on machine learning research and artificial intelligence (AI) system development for many years. 

Our research and development work include predicting IT equipment failure and computation resource utilization. In this field, our AI system helps several world-class companies to streamline the operation of their data centers. 

Our new project is to automate and simplify the supporting service with AI. Much like applying AI in self-driving cars, the purpose of this project is to build a platform that can help companies to provide the highest quality supporting service with minimal human resource requirement. This platform requires the automation of issue and solution identification from text and voice data, the emotional prediction from daily communication, failure prediction from structured and unstructured data, etc.

We invite talented people who are having the passion for achieving world-class research work to join our team to research on text mining, text sentiment analysis, and expressive speech. This job requires a Ph.D. degree in computer science/engineering, mathematics, statistics, or signal processing.

Qualifications:
1. Ph.D. degree in computer science/engineering, mathematics, statistics, or signal processing.
2. Machine learning algorithms for text mining, text sentiment analysis, and expressive speech 
3. Software engineering technologies, i.e. Scala, Java, or R.
job_lists.other_condition:
1. Ph.D. in computer Science/Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or a quantitative field.

2. Experience in machine learning algorithms for text mining, text sentiment analysis, and expressive speech

3. Proficiency with software engineering technologies, e.g. Scala, Java, R, Golang

job_lists.title: IT Section Manager - MFG Application Development
job_lists.company: 台灣美光晶圓科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: IT Manager of MFG Application Development is responsible for planning, facilitating, organizing, and motivating agile teams to achieve a high level of performance and quality in delivery solutions that provide exceptional business value to users. We are looking for experienced Software Engineers with solid leadership skills that aspire to learn, enjoy helping customers, love to innovate, and dedicate themselves to the development and performance of their team. To be a successful candidate, you must possess strong communication and problem solving skills, which you will use to work with customers, fix problems, and collaborate with your team to deliver high quality service. You will manage high visibility solution delivery using agile methods in a fast-paced environment. You will provide ideas and encourage innovation within your team and you will leverage solid command skills, integrity, teamwork and trust to help your team achieve the appropriate level of planning and provide the right balance of agility and predictability. Responsibilities and TasksProvide Organizational Leadership • Maintain domain knowledge to provide subject matter expertise and ensure the team remains current on required skills• Report on key performance metrics to inform data-driven decisions and drive continuous improvement• Provide timely and honest feedback to inspire team members toward higher levels of commitment and influence• Promote empowerment of the team to build a cohesive, high performing team.• Manage conflict and drive issues to resolution Project Planning and Management• Define project vision, objectives, and roadmap while focusing on regular and timely delivery of value.• Manage project work according to Project Management Office processes, including maintaining the project in appropriate systems, managing gate reviews and other controls, and promulgating status information.• Manage the risk and deployment of deliverables into production and resolve issues that affect release scope, schedule, and quality• Coordinate with other teams who share dependencies to achieve solution delivery according to customer expectations. Develop and Deliver Effective and Efficient Solutions • Work with internal partners and analysts, to implement solutions with business cases focused on solving problems and enhancing decision making with data and information• Collaborate with other IT Solution Delivery teams to share knowledge, ensure alignment and demonstrate unified IT solutions and services• Implement solutions that eliminate or minimize technical debt through a well-designed architecture, data model, and lifecycle• Work with Operations team to understand operational issues escalated to engineering team, assist in prioritizing, and manage communication.
job_lists.other_condition: Qualifications• 5+ years leading a function responsible for developing, delivering, and supporting MFG application solutions • Strong communication skills, with a track record of significant direct interaction and peer leadership with partners across the company• Experience in office and collaboration tools (SharePoint, JIRA, Portfolio, Confluence, TFS) is a plus• Experience being on an Agile team (Scrum, Kanban, etc) and delivering work as part of that team• Ability to independently prioritize work from multiple sources, including quick tasks and large scale project work to maintain high level of commitment• Strong analytical and problem solving skills to participate and contribute to problem solving and incident management.• Good communication skills in English or TOEIC 650 and above• Business travel is expected and sometimes to co-operate with partner/customer in different time zone (USA, India…etc) is needed.• Experience in the following technologies is also needed:• Windows• C#, Perl• ASP.NET, HTML• Microsoft .NET Framework and MVC architecture• One or more of the following: MS SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL  EducationRequired Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent experience in Information Technology(Information Engineering, Information Management, Software Engineering)

job_lists.title: (LBTW) LINE Pay - Technical Consultant
job_lists.company: LINE Taiwan_台灣連線股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
[Job Description]
With rapid growth of LINE Pay, technical consultant acts as a very important role for helping LINE Pay business grow in TW market. You will initially act like a bridge between LINE Pay and partner service, helping them to architect systems for various collaborations of different types of LINE Pay business, in addition, you are the primary contact who delivers technical insights from developer team to local partner, or reflecting local requirements to relevant stakeholders for making LINE Pay service completely, compatibly into local.

As a technical consultant in LINE Pay, you work closely with sales team and must be experienced and creative in problem solving, using latest technologies to lead the team and partners to challenge any business difficulty. You are the expert who provides suitable solutions quickly responded to any condition, moreover, you are the guard of LINE Pay who ensures the service and products well and safely integrated in partner side. The communication capability is highly required for this role.

[Responsibilities]
- Help LINE Pay business growth by excellent technical consultation skills.
- Define technical scope for partner integration, support with necessary documentation, presentation and guidance.
- Represent LINE Pay as a technical expert, identifying and solving partner’s technical problems with LINE Pay technologies.
- Guarantee integration qualities of partner services, especially in internet liability and security perspective.
- Plan and manage appropriate specification of new product feature for local, deliver the requirements to relevant stakeholders in different office.
- Collaboration with sales team, attending business initiatives and provide professional recommendation for any opportunity to expand LINE Pay business. 
- Provide constant, consistent, and transparent communications with all stakeholders, HQ, and execution officer.

[This position needs to have solid internet technical knowledge]
- Restful API, HTTP/S, Programming Language (Java), Networking, IT Hardware Infra (Server, Leased Line, etc.).
- Good understanding of PC & mobile payment development and service.
- Prefer the experience in Payment Gateway Company.

[Requirements]
- 3+ years of mixed experiences in software engineering, product management and technical sales. 
- Good interpersonal and communication skills.
- Good command of English. 
- Deep understanding and passion for LINE products, payment, banking, credit card or financial products.
- Detail-oriented, highly organized and able to manage multiple tasks/projects simultaneously.
- Work directly with internal clients at all levels including senior executives.
- Experience and enthusiasm for launching new products that have the potential to disrupt existing business realities.
- Entrepreneurial mindset - innovator and early adapter to new technologies.
- Thrive in a fast paced and unstructured environment; work independently with minimal supervision.

job_lists.title: Android Malware Analyst (Android病毒分析師)
job_lists.company: AVAST Software (Asia) Limited_香港商愛維士有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
The number of malware attacks on mobile platforms is significant and continually rises. Not every user realizes that it is our phone what can give away any information about us. Be it current location, shopping habits or access to bank account. Do you want to be the one who delves into the world of mobile malware, analyzes and produces the only thing that can save everyone – antidotes?

Then you belong to Avast!

You will:
- Analyze mobile software
- Do reverse engineering
- Select and categorize samples of malware
- Produce detection definitions
- Look for new sources of Android malware in China region
- Help us produce the protection against new malware that are escalating in China
- Cooperate with OEMs resolving cases

What we offer:
- 15 days of paid holiday
- 3 weeks long initial training in Avast HQ in Prague, Czech Republic
- The chance to join a major global tech company
- Many opportunities for professional growth (language courses, trainings, etc)
- Amazing and truly international work environment 

Sounds like the right challenge for you? We look forward to hearing from you!

ForceShield Software (FSS) 於2013年成立於美國加州矽谷，ForceShield採用革命性的「動態安全架構」，可將網頁的原始碼動態變形，使駭客無法找到網頁進入點，進而無法利用自動攻擊程式攻擊網站。此一技術的引擎非常輕薄，十分適合用於物聯網的保護。 ForceShield的動態變型技術將寫下「網站保護」及「物聯網保護」的新里程碑。 (投資股東含日本軟體銀行等多家創投)

~~~【職務內容】~~~
• 資訊安全產品功能開發
• 參與產品疊代和實施計畫
• 新產品研發及技術研究

~~~【職位要求】~~~
• 資訊工程相關科系，3年以上C/C++開發相關工作經驗
• 熟練使用C/C++、Python、JavaScript等
• 熟悉Linux、網路設計、熟悉ARM Embedded系统
• 熟悉Web應用開發
• 具有良好的團隊合作精神及積極主動的溝通態度
• 有強烈的學習意願，樂於分享

job_lists.title: IT Specialist 資訊專員
job_lists.company: BURBERRY_台灣博柏利股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Overall Purpose 
Provide co-ordination and hands on delivery of  all IT service delivery activities in designated country. Liaising with the Global IT Services teams and supporting Asia Pacific IT Management to provide sensational IT Service. 
Key Responsibilities
1. Regional Service Management
- Liaise with Global IT Service Management to ensure coordination, management and smooth running of the IT service within region 
- manage local service providers as agreed with Global IT Service Management to ensure delivery of service to agreed service levels 
- provide the local face of Global IT Service Management for designated country to the Director of IT
2. Regional Support Management
- deliver IT solutions for agreed key in-region activities including events (markets), retail deployment, office openings, moves and refurbishments
- liaison with in-region partner representatives and 3rd party delivery teams to ensure efficient and effective delivery and timely escalation to global teams
- manage local resources who will be the prime contact point for all infrastructure e.g. networking; cabling; and patching. Holding relationship with architect, construction etc.   These may be fixed or dotted reporting lines
- act as incident manager including management and escalation of support issues; communication to in-region users and ownership through to resolution (includes coordinating the response to emergency incidents to return the service to normal level as soon as possible, with smallest possible business impact)
- liaising with users as required to ensure user participation and satisfaction in resolution and closure processes
- timely escalation of high priority incidents and service performance/delivery issues where required to Global IT Management, Senior Regional Service Manager - Asia Pacific
3. Management responsibility
- Reports to Director of IT
- Provide care and maintenance management and leadership for local partner teams working on-site
4. Works with 
- Asia Pacific teams to support regional service reporting and service communication  
- Global IT Service Management - to escalate regional service issues and requirements and ensure delivery of service to agreed service levels
- Store & Office project Managers/Specialists and Build teams - to support and coordinate regional build activity
- Service Partners - to provide a regional prime contact point for on-site activity
- Regional Business team - to coordinate delivery and provide the local face of IT Service
- Front office team

job_lists.title: Business Analysis
job_lists.company: 英屬百慕達商美國再保險股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Specific Responsibilities
1.0 Administration
1.1 Ensure that the company’s administration standards and time service requirements are applied to the handling of all business received.
1.2 Ensure that the administration of all Taiwan business adheres to RGA treaties.
1.3 Provide administration data for input to accounting records, valuation systems and regulatory requirements.
1.4 Maintain a professional and working relationship with clients.

2.0 Reinsurance
2.1 Maintain a thorough knowledge of Taiwan reinsurance practices and specific RGA treaty practices as they pertain to the management and handling of transfer of risk.
2.2 Ensure the Taiwan business is administered appropriately through the RGA chain of companies and the International Retro Pool.

3.0 Data Management
3.1 Participate in the analysis of results and monthly statistics to include:
• New business volume (AAR, annualized premium, policy count) assumed and retro
• Inforce (AAR, annualized premium, policy count) assumed and retro.
• Explanation of fluctuations in policy-related accounts (premium, allowances, etc) and explanations of variance of the same to plan.
3.2   Participate in claims analysis and management.
3.3   Implement administrative procedures and controls for:
• New business and termination processing.
• Monthly billing
• Claims handling
• Statistical reporting
• New client review

4.0 Technical
4.1 Provide ORACLE support to other business analysts. 
4.2 Gain market knowledge of Life Reinsurance and it’s implications within administration
4.3 Gain full understanding of RGA’s Administration system  
4.4 Take ownership of clients, details to be confirmed and be responsible for all accounting aspects and client relationship with the view to loading onto system
4.5 Gain full understanding of client treaties, client data files & premium reconciliations and the specific reporting requirements for Valuations & Finance
4.6 Gain full understanding of claims reporting 
4.7 Fully document admin procedures and processes 

5.0  Interactions
5.1 Contribute to the team and respect the culture of the company.
5.2 Working closely with other RGA Taiwan teams, Claims, Underwriting, Pricing, Accounts & Financial Reporting, as well as associates from the International Support team based in St. Louis.
