job_lists.title: Business Analyst (BA)-Finance
job_lists.company: Tata Consultancy Services Limited Taiwan Branch_印度商塔塔顧問服務有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
This role’s primary responsibility is to understand and interpret the business vision and then to translate that vision from inception to implementation and post-implementation phases. By working with business stakeholders, BA need to understand their objectives, the processes they follow to perform their tasks and build requirements to service/improve/transform those processes in order to help the company achieve its goals. This may be the creation of completely new activities within the business, or transforming existing practices so they become more efficient, more productive or add more value than they presently do. 

The involvement will be through the entire System Development Life Cycle, liaising with stakeholders in building requirements documents to feed our technical coding teams, managing and updating on their progress through technical build phases and also handling the testing/rollout/delivery that during the implementation and post-implementation phases. 

Suitable candidates will be able to demonstrate the following skills/experiences: 

Experience related to Finance related function for the insurance company 
1. Identify, engage and manage stakeholders who are involved and impacted in the delivery of business goals and ensure that their requirements and accurately represented when project teams are created. 
2. Work with stakeholders, both technical and non-technical, to ensure that all teams are fully engaged and motivated to contribute to the requirements gathering process so that solutions align with the overall business vision and business goals. 
3. Be innovative in the process of gathering requirements, utilizing methods such as workshops, user interviews and other mechanisms to gather comprehensive requirements of users. Tailor these to staff working at all levels within the business. 
4. Be an integral part in the mapping out the proposed architecture of new solutions or pre-existing architecture of legacy systems and be able to justify or challenge the arrangements in order to optimize results for the business. 
5. Utilize strong analytical skills to model the performance (in theory or in practice) of systems and identify weaknesses or pressure points where they can be improved. Demonstrate findings to technical and non-technical teams with a view to gaining support and approval on benefits of changes/reviews. 
6. Be pro-active and creative in identifying opportunities for improvement without waiting for discussions or issues to be raised formally by teams within the business. 
7. Prioritize and organize workload to give greatest priority to those work streams which are most critical to the business. Communicate both up and down the management chain of the business to help stakeholders understand such prioritization. 

We are seeking business analysts familiar with 3 years digital project implementation experience (customer / partner servicing platforms by instance) or/and with 5 years experience related to New Business, POS, Marketing and finance function for the insurance company.
job_lists.other_condition:
1. A relevant degree where analytical skills have been gained. 
2. Minimum of 3-5 years IT business analysis experience and have real experience for digital related project
3. Very strong analytical skills, these will be rigorously tested during assessment/interview. 
4. Intermediate to advanced MS Excel skills, along with working knowledge of MS Visio. 
5. Experience of working in Agile methodology, formal Agile qualifications a significant advantage.
6. Professional level of communication both for writing and orally.

job_lists.title: iOS App / iPhone App 軟體工程師
job_lists.company: 威許移動股份有限公司
job_lists.content: ✔ iOS App 工程師：基本條件：(1) 重視團隊合作並尊重不同型態的夥伴。(2) 勇於追求新技術、新設計思維。(3) 擁有 iOS 開發經驗超過 6 個月。加分條件 ( 非必要條件 )：(1) 作品可於 App Store 公開下載者。(2) 擁有 EC 電子商務經驗者更佳。(3) 熟悉 API 資料串接者更佳。(4) 處理過複雜 UI 介面者更佳。年均不到 30 的新創公司，卻發展出數百萬人使用的 APP 服務，我們要的就是有熱情、有夢想的你，加入我們的行列！(一) 威許移動主要產品與服務：✔ Qsire ─ 客製化商品設計與交易平台 ( 獲選 App Store 最佳新 App )。✔ WishMall ─ 百貨商場與零售業 O2O 解決方案。✔ WishView ─ 百貨商場與零售業 Mobile ERP 解決方案。✔ WishOrder ─ 行動化餐飲訂購服務。(二) 產品與服務描述：---------------------► Qsire---------------------我們相信，每個人都是獨特的個體，而你生活中的一切，也該獨一無二！在 Qsire 你可以親自參與商品的設計過程，讓每個環節加入你喜愛的元素，盡顯個人風采。Qsire 於 2015/11 上線，獲得【 App Store 最佳新 App 】殊榮！你可以在這裡設計專屬於自己的 3D 列印手機殼！我們將持續導入新的客製化商品 ( 服飾 / 鞋帽 / 包包 ... )，發展全球視野的服務。---------------------► WishMall---------------------虛實整合已成為百貨與零售業的發展趨勢，威許移動為新光三越、遠東百貨、誠品書店、屈臣氏、潤泰 CityLink 創新商場、遠雄 U-TOWN 購物中心、北京金融街購物中心、重慶協信購物中心 ... 等，發展各式各樣的 O2O App 應用，透過行動化特性提供便捷服務 ( 虛擬會員卡、行動購物、電子優惠券、餐廳訂位 )，近期更應用 Beacon 技術，實現近端感知與行銷互動，並用於巡檢與查核作業。---------------------► WishView---------------------透過行動設備發展移動式管理策略，建構行動化的營運績效管理系統、事件回報通知系統、部門群組溝通系統；透過安全加密的權限控管機制，即時連入企業 ERP 網路查詢營運數據並取得視覺化分析圖表，結合通報系統接收突發訊息，並以內部溝通群組傳遞指示與應對策略。---------------------► WishOrder---------------------全臺第一個行動點餐服務 MOS Order ( 摩斯漢堡 )，自 2012 年推出以來，獲得使用者廣泛支持，已突破百萬次下載！每天都有成千上萬的用戶，透過這款服務訂購喜愛餐點。威許移動更在 2014 年與優質的飲料連鎖店「大苑子茶飲」合作，協助大苑子發展行動訂購飲料服務，並設計優惠券等行銷機制，掀起一波波秒殺與搶換風潮。2016 年度完成 McDonald's 麥當勞報報 APP，吸引不分年齡群每日集點、領取優惠劵，使用人數節節飆升，天氣鬧鈴一響，優惠就來！威許移動開發的 APP 都能獲得使用者四到五顆星的高度評價，過去三年間，我們開發的 APP 累計已突破 370 萬次下載，協助品牌企業客戶提供更好的行動化服務給終端消費者。威許移動不只是開發程式，更強調使用者體驗，我們重視流程設計、介面設計、視覺設計 ( Flow Design / UI Design / Visual Design )，為的是提供更好的使用體驗！威許移動持續提供穩定服務與高度品質，協助客戶發展長期的行動化策略！我們相信行動化既是趨勢，更能強化顧客關係、增加企業營收、降低企業營運成本、強化營運績效。誠摯邀請年輕的你，加入這個「‎新創」事業體，跳出「舊世代」的包袱，一起追求成長，一起創造價值！

job_lists.title: Associate Client Operations Specialist
job_lists.company: Digital River_美商亞太數位潮流科技有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
The Associate Client Operations Specialist provides first/second tier support for Digital River internal departments, vendors and clients.  

The Specialist helps ensure that all issues/events/defects gets responded to and resolved within the agreed service levels.
The Specialist will also assist with basic troubleshooting and with day to day operational needs such as merchandising, product setup, store configurations, gathering data, testing, and basic client communication.

Key Responsibilities
o Be the main point of contact for DR internal departments, vendors and clients to report issues/events/defects.
o Triage, prioritize and submit incidents/events/defects for all issues reported to the Defect/Incident Mgmt team.
o Provide first-line investigation and diagnosis of all Incidents/events/defects.
o Work with multi-disciplined and multi-location teams, running multiple tickets simultaneously.
o Monitor the Incidents/Events and manage workload in their respective queues to ensure that Service Level Agreement and Operational Level Agreement are respected.
o Responsible for driving incidents/events/defects to appropriate resolutions, by engaging support teams as needed.
o Verify resolution with users and resolve Incidents/events in ITSM tool.
o Responsible for keeping DR internal departments, vendors and client informed about their Incidents/events/defect’ status at agreed intervals. 
o Facilitate and lead, meetings/ conference bridges on DR side to troubleshoot and drive major escalations.
o Join client’s meeting, conference bridges as needed/requested.
o Suggest areas for improvement in internal processes along with possible solutions.
o Assist clients and internal team members with day to day operational needs such as merchandising, product setup, store configurations, gathering data, testing, and basic client communication.
o Work with internal and external clients to deliver tasks and document tasks and time spent on requests.
o Report to Client Operations Manager and/or Client Operations Director on status of work being performed.
o Suggest areas for improvement in internal processes along with possible solutions.

job_lists.company: 104職場卓越計畫 – 徵才專區（設計類）
job_lists.content:
本職務為 昆盈企業股份有限公司加入104職場卓越計畫之職缺；欲應徵本職缺，必須符合計畫人才規範；詳情請見本計畫說明（請點擊本頁職務名稱下方的計劃名稱處，可見詳細計劃說明）

【工作任務】
結合昆盈領先的電腦週邊和消費電子硬體設備，我們將致力於打造一個全系統智能連接平台和社區共享平台， 並提供更好用戶體驗的軟件產品。 
我們正在找一群對網路及行動開發技術極具熱情的夥伴，共同開發全新的響應式電商網站、Desktop Apps以及Mobile Apps。

作為UI設計師， 工作內容包括： 
1. 負責國際化電子商務網站的UI設計
2. 負責國際化Mobile Apps和Desktop Apps的UI設計
3. 商業簡報設計與製作
4. 負責或參與網站和Apps的UX設計
5. 與相關Team協作執行專案

我們期望您擁有的特質：
1. 了解網站以及Apps設計規範， 有兩年以上的相關產品設計經驗
2. 具備邏輯思維，對產品功能有系統性思考及訊息提煉和整理能力。

job_lists.skills: 系統架構規劃、軟體工程系統開發、軟體程式設計、網路程式設計、模組化系統設計

job_lists.company: LINE Taiwan_台灣連線股份有限公司
job_lists.content: [About this Job]We are looking for bright, creative, proactive service QA engineer who is interested in ensuring software quality by executing test cases, identifying issues, and cooperating with other stakeholders.LINE provides not only instant message service but also a comprehensive platform allowing developer to create any kinds of application focus on mobile experience. Based on the same platform, LINE developers also create many other popular services. Under LINE Taiwan engineering organization, developer and QA engineer work closely to meet the same goal. Developer is in charge application development and QA engineer is to design and execute test cases, ensuring that they meet the needs of customers and other stakeholders related to a service.[Responsibilities]- Prepare documentation and test cases according to service specs- Identify quality issues and drive corrective actions to resolve them- Co-work with planners and developers to isolate issues by collecting detailed process steps, log files, and other data- Assist with design and execute manual test for new and existing services- Use tools to execute load test and stress test- Facilitate stakeholders to understand, learn, and follow the quality assurance process- Estimate and manage release schedule[Qualifications]- CS/MIS/EE or related BS graduate- Curious and eager to learn new technology- Responsible for the assigned tasks- Experience of software quality assurance model or methodology, familiar with quality metrics- Experiences in web or mobile testing- Experiences in agile development is a plus- Knows Japanese/Korean language is a plus- Familiar with Jira/Confluence is a plus- At least 5-year experiences in software QA

You will also be responsible to support factory requirement of manufacturing and testing to ensure timely product launch. You will be required to provide quick turnaround support for debugging of hardware-software related issue as well as new platform development. You may be required to handle release management, configuration management and integration of software.Requirements:1. Masters or Bachelors Degree in Electrical and Electronics or Computer Engineering 2. Software programming experience preferably in C/C++.3. Experience with at least one of the following software development functional area is required :o embedded Linux system,o bootloader o kernel and device driver, o Android framework,o Android application,o Modem4. Familiar with ARM structure processer, with a certain basis of embedded hardware knowledge5. Candidate with more than 6 years relevant experience may be considered for senior position6. Able to communicate in English and Mandarin7. Fresh graduate are encourage to apply

job_lists.title: 1562 Cloud Security Architect (InfoSec Team)
job_lists.company: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: Trend Micro Incorporated, a global cloud security leader, creates a world safe for exchanging digital information with its Internet content security and threat management solutions for businesses and consumers. A pioneer in server security with over 25 years’ experience, we deliver top-ranked client, server and cloud-based security that fits our customers’ and partners’ needs, stops new threats faster, and protects data in physical, virtualized and cloud environments.Within our Information Security team, we need to have the best talents to help us continuously improve our security defenses against the ever changing threat landscape as well as responding to both opportunistic and targeted cyberattacks.As a Cloud Security Architect, you will contribute in the overall strategy, design and development of security architecture for different types of public, private and hybrid cloud environment. Responsibilities Lead security initiatives in gaining continuous visibility on cloud-based servers/applications and development of security controls in common cloud infrastructurePerform design reviews to assess security risk and requirements for adoption of new technologies.Proactively engage with senior management, product/service engineering and other technology teams to understand business goals and enterprise security needs.Participate in continuous evaluation of security controls (technology or process) against the current threats Minimum qualificationsAny Bachelor’s degreeAt least 5 years’ experience as a Security ArchitectAt least 3 years’ experience in architecting solutions with Cloud IaaS/SaaS/PaaS providers such as Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud, Salesforce.comExperience in working as part of a cross-functional team to implement solutionsGood verbal and written English communication skills that can level with different management and technical teamsExperience with continuous integration/continuous deployment (Git, Jenkins)  and configuration management (Ansible, Puppet, etc.)Knowledge in broad set of on-premise and cloud security toolsKnowledge of leading edge technology in cloud architecture methods and practices and server virtualization technologiesKnowledge in multiple high-level programming language and scripting language  Preferred qualificationsMaster’s degree with 8 or more years of enterprise security experienceCloud Security related certifications such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect, AWS Certified DevOps EngineerExperience with penetration testing and application security testingExperience with computer forensics and incident response toolsExperience with use case development using ArcSight ESM or with any SIEM platform
